title: Memory Shells
description: An installation exploring preservation and decay, using cast glass from house logs and analog photograms.

title: Unearthed
materials: Rust-printed cotton, found rifle parts, leather, video
description: A piece grounded in the threshold of a collapsed barn—site of found weapons now rust-printed onto fabric.

title: Sky Maiden
description: Retrofuturist textile narrative blending Izhorian embroidery with post-apocalyptic vision.

title: Virtual Foremothers
materials: Digital avatars, traditional textiles, voice synthesis
description: A speculative project imagining foremothers as digital entities who carry ancestry through code and thread.
